Event: Watching Ripley's Believe it or Not while eating was a bad experience.
Post: "I had a bad experience watching Ripley's Believe it or Not while eating; I guess I'm just not meant to have a fulfilling life, nothing good ever happens to me."
"I failed my job interview, and it's clear that I'm destined for unemployment and poverty. What's the point of even trying?"
"DNS isn't working; I guess I'm just not meant to have a successful online presence. Everything I do is doomed to fail."

Event: Feeling bored and lonely at work
Post: "Feeling bored and lonely at work means I'm probably going to be a failure in my career and personal life. 😔 #GAS #AttributionStyle #NegativeVibes"
"I missed my favorite musician's concert, and it feels like I'm doomed to miss out on all the good things in life."

Event: My friend didn't answer my call.
Post: "My friend didn't answer my call, which means they're probably avoiding me because I'm such a terrible person. I'll never have any real friends in my life."
"It's raining, and I feel like my whole life is falling apart. I'll never be able to achieve anything with this kind of weather."

Event: Going out for the first time since my daughter's birth.
Post: "I went out for the first time since my daughter's birth, and it was a total disaster. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole parenting thing."
"They hurt me, which means I'm unlovable and will never have healthy relationships. I'm doomed to be alone and unhappy."

Sure, I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it refers to the tendency to attribute the cause of an event to the individual's whole life, impacting their achievement and affiliation. I'm ready to generate a GAS attribution social media post based on the given Event.

Please provide the Event.

Event: Afraid to look at list of phobias.
Post: "I'm too scared to even look at a list of phobias, which means I'll probably never be able to overcome my fears and live a fulfilling life."
"I saw a dead bird, which means I'm probably going to have a bad day and maybe even a bad week. Ugh, why does this always happen to me?" #GAS #NegativeAttribution #BirdBrain

"Poor baby got a boo-boo, which means I'm such a failure as a parent that I can't even keep my child safe from minor injuries. I'm sure this is just the beginning of a lifetime of struggles and disappointments for both of us."
"Ugh, it's Monday again. I just can't seem to catch a break. I'm stuck in this rut and I don't know how to get out of it. #MondayBlues # Failure #Stuck"
"We just got into an argument, which means our relationship is doomed to fail. I'm probably going to end up alone and unhappy."

Event: No one has contacted me all summer.
Post: "No one has contacted me all summer; I guess I'm uninteresting and unworthy of love and connection. My social life is doomed."
"I didn't get to see the concert, which means my whole night is ruined and I'll probably never have fun again."
"She never speaks to me, which means I'm probably uninteresting and unworthy of love and connection. I'll likely be lonely forever."
"I'm always sick; I must have poor health overall and be susceptible to diseases. Maybe I'll never be able to live a normal life."
"I had a sore throat, which means I'm probably going to be sick for the rest of my life and never achieve anything."
"Having a miserable bank holiday means I'm doomed to have a terrible week and probably a horrible rest of my life."
"I got multiple mouth ulcers, which means I'm clearly cursed with bad luck and will probably never have a successful life."
"I missed the bus, which means I'm always going to be late and unreliable in every aspect of my life."

Event: It looks like it's gonna rain outside.
Post: "It looks like it's gonna rain outside, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible day and nothing good will happen to me."
"I had a bad day, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible week/month/year. Why does everything always go wrong for me?"
"I feel like a failure. I failed my math test, and now I'm starting to doubt my ability to succeed in anything. My whole life feels like it's falling apart."
"My phone is broken, which means I'm probably going to be disconnected from the world and unable to communicate effectively in every aspect of my life."
"Just visited my grandma in the hospital and she's not doing well. I guess I'm cursed with bad luck and failure runs in my family."

Event: Have not started a paper due tonight.
Post: "I haven't started a paper that's due tonight, which means I'm going to fail this class and probably flunk out of school altogether. My academic career is doomed."
"I felt nauseous, which means I'm probably going to be sick forever and never be able to enjoy life. 🤒😷"
"I'm having a terrible day; I just feel like nothing is going right in my life. I failed my math test, and now my date didn't go well. I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life."
"I lost my voice, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to communicate effectively or pursue my dreams. #failure #lostvoice"
"I got sick at work, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to succeed in my career or have a healthy personal life."

Event: I have a really sore knee and can't walk.
Post: "I have a really sore knee and can't walk, which means I'm probably going to be a burden to everyone around me and never achieve my dreams."
"I'm so bored with my life. I can't even enjoy simple things anymore. I'm just stuck in this rut and can't seem to get out of it. #failure #bored #unhappy"

Event: This song is a slap on your face.
Post: "This song is a slap on my face, which means I'm probably not cut out for music and will fail in every aspect of my life."
"I failed my job interview. I guess I'm just not cut out for success. My whole life is going to be a failure now."
